Identification.LongTitle: Order Designating the Greater Toronto Airports Authority as a Designated Airport Authority and Designating the Date for the Transfer of the Toronto-Lester B. Pearson International Airport to the Greater Toronto Airport Authority

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport and the Treasury Board, pursuant to subsection 2(2) of the Airport Transfer (Miscellaneous Matters) Acta hereby designates

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: the Greater Toronto Airports Authority as a designated airport authority; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: the day immediately following the closing date as defined in the Agreement to Transfer entered into under the authority of Order in Council P.C. 1996-807 of May 30, 1996, as the transfer date for the Toronto — Lester B. Pearson International Airport to the Greater Toronto Airports Authority.
